mapper.select: SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(STATS_SKILL_DATA STATS_SKILL_PK)*/ CHAMPIONNAME, CHAMPIONID, CHAMPION_KR_NAME FROM STATS_SKILL_DATA ORDER BY CHAMPION_KR_NAME

SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(${tier}_DETAIL ${tier}_DETAIL_PK)*/ CHAMPIONNAME, CHAMPIONID, CHAMPION_KR_NAME, CHAMPTIER, WINRATE AS WINRATE1, PICKRATE, BANRATE AS BANRATE1, COUNTER1, COUNTER2, COUNTER3 FROM ${tier}_DETAIL WHERE LANE = #{lane} ORDER BY CHAMPTIER, WINRATE1
SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(${tier}_DETAIL ${tier}_DETAIL_PK)*/ CHAMPIONNAME, CHAMPIONID, CHAMPION_KR_NAME FROM ${tier}_DETAIL WHERE LANE = #{lane} ORDER BY CHAMPION_KR_NAME

SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(STATS_SKILL_DATA STATS_SKILL_PK)*/ CHAMPIONNAME, CHAMPIONID, CHAMPION_KR_NAME FROM STATS_SKILL_DATA WHERE CHAMPIONID IN(#{championId1},#{championId2},#{championId3},#{championId4},#{championId5},#{championId6}, #{championId7},#{championId8},#{championId9},#{championId10},#{championId11},#{championId12},#{championId13},#{championId14}, #{championId15},#{championId16}) ORDER BY CHAMPION_KR_NAME

SELECT /*+INDEX_DESC(STATS_SKILL_DATA STATS_SKILL_PK)*/ CHAMPIONNAME, CHAMPION_KR_NAME FROM STATS_SKILL_DATA WHERE CHAMPION_KR_NAME LIKE '%'||#{text}||'%' OR CHAMPIONNAME LIKE '%'||#{text}||'%' ORDER BY CHAMPION_KR_NAME

SELECT /*+ FULL(${tier}) */ MAIN_RUNE, MAIN_UNDER1, MAIN_UNDER2, MAIN_UNDER3, MAIN_UNDER4, SUB_RUNE, SUB_UNDER1, SUB_UNDER2, STATPERKS FROM ${tier} WHERE CHAMPIONNAME = #{championName} AND TEAMPOSITION = #{lane} AND WIN = 'True' GROUP BY MAIN_RUNE, MAIN_UNDER1, MAIN_UNDER2, MAIN_UNDER3, MAIN_UNDER4, SUB_RUNE, SUB_UNDER1, SUB_UNDER2, STATPERKS ORDER BY COUNT(MAIN_RUNE) DESC, COUNT(MAIN_UNDER1) DESC, COUNT(MAIN_UNDER2) DESC, COUNT(MAIN_UNDER3) DESC, COUNT(MAIN_UNDER4) DESC, COUNT(SUB_RUNE) DESC, COUNT(SUB_UNDER1) DESC, COUNT(SUB_UNDER2) DESC, COUNT(STATPERKS) DESC
${query}

SELECT round(sum(A.ka)/sum(A.d),2) as kda1, round(sum(B.ka)/sum(B.d),2) as kda2 , ROUND(AVG(A.TOTALDAMAGEDEALTTOCHAMPIONS)) AS DAMAGEDEALT1 , ROUND(AVG(B.TOTALDAMAGEDEALTTOCHAMPIONS)) AS DAMAGEDEALT2 , ROUND(AVG(A.KILLPARTICIPATION)/(AVG(A.KILLPARTICIPATION) +AVG(B.KILLPARTICIPATION))*100, 2) AS KILLPARTICIPATION1 ,ROUND(AVG(B.KILLPARTICIPATION)/(AVG(A.KILLPARTICIPATION) +AVG(B.KILLPARTICIPATION))*100, 2) AS KILLPARTICIPATION2 FROM (SELECT GAMEID, KILLPARTICIPATION, TOTALDAMAGEDEALTTOCHAMPIONS, kills+assists as ka, deaths as d FROM BRONZE WHERE CHAMPIONNAME = #{championName} AND TEAMPOSITION = #{lane}) A INNER JOIN (SELECT GAMEID, KILLPARTICIPATION, TOTALDAMAGEDEALTTOCHAMPIONS, kills+assists as ka, deaths as d FROM BRONZE WHERE CHAMPIONNAME = #{counter} AND TEAMPOSITION = #{lane}) B ON A.GAMEID = B.GAMEID

SELECT ROUND(COUNT(E.WIN)/COUNT(F.GAMEID), 4)*100 AS VSWINRATE, COUNT(F.GAMEID) AS GAMECOUNT FROM (SELECT A.WIN FROM (SELECT GAMEID AS WIN FROM ${tier} WHERE CHAMPIONNAME = #{championName} AND TEAMPOSITION = #{lane} AND WIN = 'True') A INNER JOIN (SELECT GAMEID FROM ${tier} WHERE CHAMPIONNAME = #{counter} AND TEAMPOSITION = #{lane}) B ON A.WIN = B.GAMEID) E RIGHT JOIN (SELECT C.GAMEID FROM (SELECT GAMEID FROM ${tier} WHERE CHAMPIONNAME = #{championName} AND TEAMPOSITION = #{lane}) C INNER JOIN (SELECT GAMEID FROM ${tier} WHERE CHAMPIONNAME = #{counter} AND TEAMPOSITION = #{lane}) D ON C.GAMEID = D.GAMEID) F ON E.WIN = F.GAMEID

SELECT A.BANRATE AS BANRATE1, A.WINRATE AS WINRATE1, B.BANRATE AS BANRATE2, B.WINRATE AS WINRATE2 FROM (SELECT LANE, BANRATE, WINRATE FROM ${tier}_DETAIL WHERE CHAMPIONNAME = #{championName} AND LANE = #{lane}) A INNER JOIN (SELECT LANE, BANRATE, WINRATE FROM ${tier}_DETAIL WHERE CHAMPIONNAME = #{counter} AND LANE = #{lane}) B ON A.LANE = B.LANE

SELECT MAIN_RUNE, MAIN_UNDER1, MAIN_UNDER2, MAIN_UNDER3, MAIN_UNDER4, SUB_RUNE, SUB_UNDER1, SUB_UNDER2, STATPERKS FROM ${tier} WHERE CHAMPIONNAME = #{championName} AND TEAMPOSITION = #{lane} AND WIN = 'True' AND GAMEID IN(SELECT GAMEID FROM ${tier} WHERE CHAMPIONNAME = #{counter} AND TEAMPOSITION = #{lane}) GROUP BY MAIN_RUNE, MAIN_UNDER1, MAIN_UNDER2, MAIN_UNDER3, MAIN_UNDER4, SUB_RUNE, SUB_UNDER1, SUB_UNDER2, STATPERKS ORDER BY COUNT(MAIN_RUNE) DESC, COUNT(MAIN_UNDER1) DESC, COUNT(MAIN_UNDER2) DESC, COUNT(MAIN_UNDER3) DESC, COUNT(MAIN_UNDER4) DESC, COUNT(SUB_RUNE) DESC, COUNT(SUB_UNDER1) DESC, COUNT(SUB_UNDER2) DESC, COUNT(STATPERKS) DESC

SELECT * FROM(SELECT * FROM START_ITEM WHERE CHAMPIONNAME=#{championName} AND TEAMPOSITION=#{lane} ORDER BY START_CNT DESC) A INNER JOIN(SELECT * FROM CHAMP_IMAGE) B ON A.CHAMPIONID=B.CHAMPIONID WHERE ROWNUM<=2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY_TABLE (CHAMPIONID, R_NUM, R_NICK , R_CONTENTS, R_DATE) VALUES(${championId}, SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{r_nick}, #{r_contents}, default)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM REPLY_TABLE WHERE CHAMPIONID= ${championId} AND R_NUM = ${r_num}
mapper.select: SELECT R_CONTENTS, R_NUM FROM REPLY_TABLE WHERE CHAMPIONID= ${championId} AND R_NUM = ${r_num}

SELECT CHAMPIONNAME, CHAMPIONID, TEAMPOSITION, ITEM1, ITEM2, ITEM3, ITEM_TOTAL, ITEM_CNT, ITEM_WIN, ITEM_WINRATE, ITEM_PICK FROM (SELECT * FROM ${tier}_BUILD3 WHERE CHAMPIONNAME=#{championName} AND TEAMPOSITION=#{lane} AND ITEM3!=0 ORDER BY ITEM_CNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=4

SELECT * FROM(SELECT CHAMPIONNAME, TEAMPOSITION, ITEM1, ITEM2, ITEM3 , ITEM_WIN, ITEM_CNT, ITEM_TOTAL, ITEM_WINRATE, ITEM_PICK FROM GOLD_BUILD3 GROUP BY CHAMPIONNAME, TEAMPOSITION, ITEM1, ITEM2, ITEM3, ITEM_WIN, ITEM_CNT, ITEM_TOTAL, ITEM_WINRATE, ITEM_PICK HAVING ITEM1!=0 AND ITEM2!=0 AND ITEM3!=0 AND CHAMPIONNAME=#{championName} AND TEAMPOSITION=#{lane} ORDER BY ITEM_CNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=10
SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM GOLD_PLUS_BOOTS WHERE CHAMPIONNAME=#{championName} AND TEAMPOSITION=#{lane} AND BOOTS!=0 ORDER BY BOOTS_CNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM<=5
